ygData.subject: Characters in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: I must admit when I first selected my Half Elf bard I was shocked at the skimpy outfit. I bet those little red undies are not that comfortable, especially if
ygData.messageBody:
I must admit when I first selected my Half Elf bard I was shocked at the skimpy outfit. I bet those little red undies are not that comfortable, especially if they are made from leather.

But to settle the arguement my boyfriend (who has a 40th Level Enchanter) has said the Half Elf are definatly the best looking, thats why I choose this race.

Shinara
